## PayflowProTokenInput interface

Input required to fetch payment token information for Payflow Pro and Payments Pro payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PayflowProTokenInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cart\_id](./magento-api.payflowprotokeninput.cart_id.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The unique ID that identifies the customer's cart |
|  [urls](./magento-api.payflowprotokeninput.urls.md) | [PayflowProUrlInput](./magento-api.payflowprourlinput.md) | A set of relative URLs that PayPal uses for callback. |
